data.actual_result: The whole Spotify integration breaks, status will no longer update and will eventually disappear, and playing a song through someone's rich presence doesn't work either, until Discord is restarted
data.expected_result: Even though local songs aren't supported by Discord rich presence, playing anything else from the Spotify library after would still work, and the status would carry on updating properly
data.short_description: Playing a local song on Spotify breaks any integration until Canary is restarted
data.steps_to_repro: - Play a song available on Spotify - Play a local song on your PC through Spotify - Switch back to another song streamed on Spotify
